// Map-related entry types

entry_types
{
	// Doom-format element is ten bytes, Hexen-format is twenty,
	// Doom64-format uses uses 14 bytes.
	map_things
	{
		name = "Map Things";
		match_name = "THINGS";
		size_multiple = 10, 14;
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	// Doom-format element is fourteen bytes, Hexen-format is sixteen,
	// Doom64-format uses sixteen bytes like Hexen.
	map_linedefs
	{
		name = "Map Lines";
		match_name = "LINEDEFS";
		size_multiple = 14, 16;
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	// Doom64 sidedef_t is 12-byte long; "normal" sidedefs are 30-byte long.
	// The reduced size in D64 is because the textures are referenced by a
	// two-byte index rather than by their eight-byte name. 
	map_sidedefs
	{
		name = "Map Sides";
		match_name = "SIDEDEFS";
		size_multiple = 12, 30;
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	// Doom64 sector_t is 24-byte long; "normal" sectors are 26-byte long.
	// While it contains more information, the reduced size in D64 is
	// because it represents the floor and ceiling textures by a two-byte
	// index rather than by their eight-byte names.
	map_sectors
	{
		name = "Map Sectors";
		match_name = "SECTORS";
		size_multiple = 24, 26;
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_vertexes
	{
		name = "Map Vertices";
		match_name = "VERTEXES";
		size_multiple = 4;
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	// ZDBSP compressed nodes listed before normal nodes since they
	// use the same name. If they fail the header check, they are
	// normal lumps; but they can't fail a test of normalcy...
	map_znodes
	{
		name = "Map Nodes (Compressed)";
		match_name = "NODES";
		format = "znod";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_zglnodes
	{
		name = "Map GLNodes (Compressed)";
		match_name = "SSECTORS", "ZNODES";
		format = "zgln";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_zglnodes2
	{
		name = "Map GLNodes+ (Compressed)";
		match_name = "SSECTORS", "ZNODES";
		format = "zgl2";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_znodes
	{
		name = "Map Nodes (Compressed)";
		match_name = "NODES";
		format = "xnod";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_xglnodes
	{
		name = "Map GLNodes (Extended)";
		match_name = "SSECTORS", "ZNODES";
		format = "xgln";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_xglnodes2
	{
		name = "Map GLNodes+ (Extended)";
		match_name = "SSECTORS", "ZNODES";
		format = "xgl2";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_nodes
	{
		name = "Map Nodes";
		match_name = "NODES";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_ssectors
	{
		name = "Map Subsectors";
		match_name = "SSECTORS";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_segs
	{
		name = "Map Segments";
		match_name = "SEGS";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_reject
	{
		name = "Map Reject Table";
		match_name = "REJECT";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_blockmap
	{
		name = "Map Blockmap";
		match_name = BLOCKMAP;
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_behavior_h
	{
		name = "Compiled ACS (Hexen)";
		match_name = "BEHAVIOR";
		format = "acs0";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_behavior_l
	{
		name = "Compiled ACS (ZDoom)";
		match_name = "BEHAVIOR";
		format = "acsl";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_behavior_e
	{
		name = "Compiled ACS (Enhanced)";
		match_name = "BEHAVIOR";
		format = "acse";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_dialog
	{
		name = "Map Conversation";
		match_name = "dialogue", "script??";
		size_multiple = 1488, 1516;
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
	}

	// The following four lumps are used by OpenGL ports (including EDGE, GZDoom, and others)
	map_gl_vert
	{
		name = "Map GL Vertices";
		match_name = "gl_vert";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_gl_segs
	{
		name = "Map GL Segments";
		match_name = "gl_segs";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_gl_ssect
	{
		name = "Map GL Subsectors";
		match_name = "gl_ssect";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_gl_nodes
	{
		name = "Map GL Nodes";
		match_name = "gl_nodes";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	// The following three lumps are used by Doom64Ex:
	map_leafs
	{
		name = "Map Node Leaves";
		match_name = "leafs";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_lights
	{
		name = "Map Light Colors";
		match_name = "lights";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		size_multiple = 6;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}

	map_macros
	{
		name = "Map Macros";
		match_name = "macros";
		icon = "e_map_data";
		export_ext = "lmp";
		category = "Maps";
	}
}
